titleStmt.title: The causes of a publick fast, and humiliation, to be kept with all convenient diligence: by all the members of this Kirk and Kingdom of Scosland [sic]. / Set down by the Commissioners of the Generall Assemblie.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
Douglas, Robert, 1594-1674.
Ker, A.

notesStmt.note: Included: "A Letter, to the Presbyteries, from the Commissioners of the General Assemblie," signed M. Robert Dowglas, dated Sept. 12, 1650, p. 7-9.
Included: "A short Declaration and Warning, to all the Congregations of the Kirk of Scotland, From the Commiss. of the Generall Assemblie," signed A. Ker., dated Sept. 12, 1650, p. 10-12.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow Library.
